Master Answer:
The consent of one parent is needed for a health care provider to immunize a child. This parent must have the authority to give consent. Please discuss this further with your health care provider. 
Immunization nurse
Master Question: We have shared guardianship of two children. I want to follow the vaccination plan. My ex believes the children should not be vaccinated. Do I need my ex's permission to do this?
Master Question variation 0: whose ex believes the children should not be vaccinated
Master Question variation 1: can my children be vaccinated after vaccination
Master Question variation 2: vaccinating children do you need permission from ex
